name: jef-transfeera-api
description: API REST for Receivers Management built with TypeScript, KOA, Prisma 2 and Docker-compatible

scripts.dev: nodemon --ignore tests/ --watch src -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node src/server.ts
scripts.dev:debug: nodemon --ignore tests/ --watch src -e ts,tsx --exec node --inspect -r ts-node/register src/server.ts
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build-ts
scripts.migrate:integration: dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy --name postgres-init
scripts.test:integration: npm run docker:up && npm run test:migrate && dotenv -e .env.test -- jest --config jest-integration.config.json
